mapper.select: select rownum as dealNo,G.accountNo,G.otherAccountNo,G.dealType,G.amountOfMoney,G.dealDate,G.page, H.name from (select E.dealNo,E.accountNo,E.otherAccountNo,E.dealType,E.amountOfMoney,E.dealDate,E.page, F.email from (select dealNo,accountNo,otherAccountNo,dealType,amountOfMoney,dealDate,ceil(rownum/10) as page from( select dealNo,accountNo,otherAccountNo,dealType,amountOfMoney,dealDate from kangbank_deal_detail where dealDate between #{startDay} and #{endDay} and accountNo=#{accountNo} order by dealNo asc)) E, kangbank_account F where F.accountNo = E.otherAccountNo) G, kangbank_customer H where H.email = G.email and G.page=#{page}

select rownum as dealNo,G.accountNo,G.otherAccountNo,G.dealType,G.amountOfMoney,G.dealDate,G.page, H.name from (select E.dealNo,E.accountNo,E.otherAccountNo,E.dealType,E.amountOfMoney,E.dealDate,E.page, F.email from (select dealNo,accountNo,otherAccountNo,dealType,amountOfMoney,dealDate,ceil(rownum/10) as page from( select dealNo,accountNo,otherAccountNo,dealType,amountOfMoney,dealDate from kangbank_deal_detail where dealDate between #{startDay} and #{endDay} and accountNo=#{accountNo} and dealType=#{dealType} order by dealNo asc)) E, kangbank_account F where F.accountNo = E.otherAccountNo) G, kangbank_customer H where H.email = G.email and G.page=#{page}
